content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

-- Create a new external table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone

  CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone (
    LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)
  ) WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src1,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format1,
    REJECT_VALUE = 10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/taxi_zone'
  );

SELECT * FROM bronze.taxi_zone;

--Create calendar table
-- Create a new external table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.calendar') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar

  CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar (
    date_key INT, 
    date DATE, 
    year SMALLINT, 
    month TINYINT, 
    day TINYINT, 
    day_name VARCHAR(15), 
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month TINYINT, 
    week_of_year TINYINT, 
    month_name VARCHAR(15), 
    year_month INT, 
    year_week INt
  ) WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src1,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format1,
    REJECT_VALUE = 10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/calendar'
  );

SELECT * FROM bronze.calendar;

--Create external table on vendor
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vendor') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor

  CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor (
    vendor_id TINYINT,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(25)
  )  WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/vendor.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src1,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format1,
    REJECT_VALUE = 10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/vendor'
  );

SELECT * FROM bronze.vendor;

--Create external table trip_type
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_type') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type

  CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type (
    trip_type TINYINT,
    trip_type_desc VARCHAR(30)
  )  WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_type.tsv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src1,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format2,
    REJECT_VALUE = 10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/trip_type'
  );

SELECT * FROM bronze.trip_type;

--Rejection_value is not supported for parsor version 2.0
--Create external table on trip_data
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data

  CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
  ) WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src1,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
    --REJECT_VALUE = 10, --not supported for PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    --REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/trip_data'
  );


SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.trip_data;

--Create external table on parquet file
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_parquet') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet

  CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
  ) WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src1,
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
  );


SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.trip_data_green_parquet;
